arm_group.description: Nexis ACCL lenses vs commercial Toric Lenses

brief_summary.textblock:
The objective of this study is to evaluate the fitting and visual outcomes of Nexis Lens,
      made of silicone commonly used in the contact lens industry, on healthy eye with or without
      astigmatism.

clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluation Study on Corneal Lens for Vision Correction

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          1. Patient with good corneal health

          2. Age 18-65.

          3. Patients able to understand the requirements of the study and willing to follow study
             instructions, to provide written informed consent to participate, and who agree to
             comply with all study requirements.

          4. Best corrected visual acuity of 20/20 or better in the study eye/s

        Exclusion Criteria:

          1. Any other anterior segment abnormality.

          2. No previous corneal procedures, including Laser Vision Correction.

          3. Any abnormalities associated with the eye lids.

          4. Clinically significant inflammation or infection within six (6) months prior to
             study.

          5. Uncontrolled systemic disease (e.g., diabetes, hypertension, etc.) in the opinion of
             the Investigator.

          6. Participation in any study involving an investigational drug or device within the
             past 30 calendar days, or ongoing participation in a study with an investigational
             material except studies using corneal lenses.

          7. Intolerance or hypersensitivity to topical anesthetics, fluorescein, or components of
             the material.

          8. Specifically known intolerance or hypersensitivity to contact lenses.

          9. Any condition that, in the opinion of the investigator, would jeopardize the safety
             of the patient.

clinical_study.official_title: Evaluation Study on Corneal Lens for Vision Correction

oversight_info.authority: United States: Food and Drug Administration

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Safety/Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Crossover Assignment, Masking: Single Blind (Subject), Primary Purpose: Treatment
